songs.title: On My Mind
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wake up in the evening
Gather all the memories made
But I can't escape the feeling
That you wanted me to stay

[Chorus 1]
I replay the thoughts that you left with me
'cause it takes me back to where I'm meant to be
I'll give you my heart as a guarantee
To spend my life just you and me

[Verse 2]
I need to feel your healing
Take me to another place
And now I can't stop the bleeding
Now you're running through my veins

[Chorus 2]
And it hurts like hell that you're not with me
And the hardest part is, is that you're bound to see
Your hands on me, you take me away
Oh, I'll give you the world just to hear you say

[Hook]
You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
Oh, I need you tonight

You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
You, you're on my mind
Oh, I need you tonight
